content: Verify BigCommerce store requirements and access GraphQL Storefront API playground
Install required tools (Node.js, Vercel CLI, Git)
Clone bigcommerce/nextjs-commerce repository and install dependencies
Create .env.local with BigCommerce environment variables template
Set up API authentication and generate GraphQL Storefront API token
Configure GraphQL client and test API connectivity
Implement core commerce features (products, cart, checkout)
Configure performance optimizations and SEO settings
Test local development and all commerce flows
Set up Vercel deployment and production environment
Create documentation (setup, environment, API, deployment guides)
